summary.para: Defines general properties of a state object.

remarks.para: The presence of this subobject in a state object is optional. If present, all exports in the state object must be associated with the same subobject (or one with a matching definition). This consistency requirement does not apply across existing collections that are included in a larger state object.

summary.para: A value from the flags enumeration that specifies the requirements for the state object.
